column4: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/AMD64/FirefoxAndPlugins: 64-bit Firefox and 64-bit Flash plugin (Not officially supported by Ubuntu)
if it is not supported by ubuntu, the why does the package flashplugin-installer install 64 bits flash?
there are betas for 64 bit flash 10.1 that you can easily install by extracting then  user cp filename.so into ~/.mozilla/plugins
